lead_paragraph: Sirhan B. Sirhan, who is serving a life sentence for the 1968 murder of Senator Robert F. Kennedy, has again been denied parole. "This type of crime is a great threat to the values, mores and laws of the nation," said Jim Nielsen, the chairman of a three-member panel of the Board of Prison Terms that denied the inmate's parole request on Tuesday.

headline.main: California Again Denies Parole for Sirhan
